sections.name: Intro
lyrics: Put your loving hand out, baby
'Cause I'm beggin'
***Instru***

sections.name: Refrain
lyrics: I'm beggin', beggin' you
So, put your loving hand out, baby
I'm beggin', beggin' you
So, put your loving hand out, darling

sections.name: Couplet!peches
lyrics: Riding high, when I was king
I played it hard and fast, 'cause I had everything
I walked away, but you warned me then
But easy come, and easy go, and it would end

sections.name: Couplet!cocottes
lyrics: So, any time I bleed, you let me go
Yeah, any time I feed, you get me know
Any time I seek, you let me know
But I plan and see, just let me go
I'm on my knees while I'm beggin'
'Cause I don't want to lose you
Hey yeah, ratatata

sections.name: Refrain
lyrics: 'Cause I'm beggin', beggin' you
And put your loving hand out, baby
I'm beggin', beggin' you
And put your loving hand out, darling

sections.name: Couplet!calme
lyrics: I need you to understand
Tried so hard to be your man
The kind of man you want in the end
Only then can I begin to live again

sections.name: Couplet!pêches
lyrics: An empty shell
I used to be
The shadow of my life was hanging over me
A broken man
That I don't know
Won't even stand the devil's chance to win my soul

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: What we doing? What we chasing?
Why the bottom? Why the basement?
Why we got good shit, don't embrace it?
Why the feel for the need to replace me?
You're the wrong way track from the good
I want to paint a picture telling where we could be at
Like a heart ain't attached the way it should
You can give it away, you had, and you took the pay
But I keep walking on
Keep opening doors
Keep hoping for
That the call is yours
Keep calls on hold
'Cause I don't wanna live in a broken home
Girl, I'm begging
Mmm, ye-e-e-ah

sections.name: Refrain!pêches
lyrics: I'm beggin', beggin' you
So, put your loving hand out, baby
I'm beggin', beggin' you
So, put your loving hand out, darling

sections.name: Couplet!calme
lyrics: I'm fighting hard
To hold my own
Just can't make it all alone
I'm holding on
I can't fall back
I'm just a calm 'bout to fade to black
